column6: Activities, value chain and other business relationships
column7: With over AUD 12 trillion in assets under management globally as of 30 June 2023, including over AUD 3.4 trillion in ETFs, Vanguard is one of the world's largest global investment management companies.
Vanguard Australia has over 800 permanent and contingent Australia-based crew, most of whom are based at its head office in Melbourne, Victoria.
Vanguard's Board of Directors comprises four directors.

column6: Nomination and selection of the highest governance body

column7: Mr. Daniel Shrimski is the Managing Director of Vanguard's Board of Directors.

column6: Role of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of impacts
column7: The Vanguard Australia Board is responsible for Vanguard's Modern Slavery Statement. The Executive Leadership Team has also been involved in the development and endorsement of this Statement and is responsible for implementing the objectives considered in this Statement.

column13: Vanguard consistently seeks to earn and maintain the trust and loyalty of its investors by adhering to the highest standards of corporate ethical behaviour. Vanguard follows all applicable laws and regulations and the standards of conduct in Vanguard's Code of Ethical Conduct (the Code). The Code has been approved and adopted by the Boards of all Vanguard's entities, including Vanguard Australia.
column20: Code of Ethical Conduct, ethical behaviour, standard of conduct

column7: Vanguard offers several equity and fixed-income products tracking indices that exclude exposure to companies that do not meet specific socially responsible criteria related to the environment, human rights, health and safety, labour standards or diversity. These products also exclude index constituents engaged in activities that result in serious violations of the United Nations Global Compact (UNGC).\t

column6: Mechanisms for seeking advice and raising concern
column13: Vanguard maintains a Whistleblowing Policy whereby crew can raise any concerns regarding unethical behaviour or potential wrongdoing in confidence and without fear of action being taken against them. Vanguard also has a hotline for crew to report any concerns anonymously. The Whistleblowing Policy and reporting hotline are explained to the crew when they join the organisation and reinforced through training and communication channels.

column8: External manager selection and oversight process
column13: Vanguard actively uses external investment managers to manage funds, so they are responsible for proxy voting and stewardship activity for their assets. Each manager has proxy voting guidelines that govern their assessment of ESG risks and voting decisions. Vanguard's external manager selection and oversight processes ensure that external investment managers have the ability and governance practices required to carry out this responsibility in the best interests of the Vanguard funds they manage.
column20: External investment manager, proxy voting, stewardship activity
